remarks.para: This media could be from a microphone (through ) or from a remote peer on a WebRTC call (using the 's audio tracks).
A MediaStreamAudioSourceNode has no inputs and exactly one output, and is created using the method.
The MediaStreamAudioSourceNode takes the audio from the first whose attribute's value is audio. See Track ordering for more information about the order of tracks.
The number of channels output by the node matches the number of tracks found in the selected audio track.
